import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import LoadingBar from "react-top-loading-bar"; import Navbar from "../Navbar"; import Side from "../Side"; import Sidebar from "../Sidebar"; import Channel from "./Channel"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import LazyImage from "../../pages/LazyImage"; import thumbnail from '../../assets/placeholder.jpg'; export default function ChannelPlaylist({ userInfo, subdata, firstplaylist, playlists, playlistvideos }){ const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); const { channelslug } = useParams(); const channelslu = channelslug.replace('@', ''); useEffect(() => { }, []) return ( <> {userInfo.channeluser ? ( {`${userInfo.channeluser} - YouTube`} ):( YouTube )}
{playlists ? ( <>

Created Playlists ({playlists.length})

{playlists.length <= 4 ? ( <> {playlists.map((video, index) => (
{playlists[index].playlistvideos.length} {playlists[index].playlistvideos.length === 1 ? "video":"videos"}

{video.playlistname}

View full playlist
))}
):( <> {playlists.map((video, index) => (
{playlists[index].playlistvideos.length} {playlists[index].playlistvideos.length === 1 ? "video":"videos"}

{video.playlistname}

))} )}
):( )}
) }
